    • Method Detail

      • onResponse

        public void onResponse(retrofit2.Call<com.mapbox.services.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse> call,
                       retrofit2.Response<com.mapbox.services.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse> response)
        A new directions response has been received.

        The DirectionsResponse is validated. If navigation is running, MapboxNavigation is updated and reroute state is dismissed. If not, navigation is started.

        Specified by:
        onResponse in interface retrofit2.Callback<com.mapbox.services.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse>
        Parameters:
        call - used to request the new DirectionsRoute
        response - contains the new DirectionsRoute
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • extractLaunchData

        public void extractLaunchData(Activity activity)
        Checks the activity used to launch this activity. Will start navigation based on the data found in the Intent
        Parameters:
        activity - holds either a set of Position coordinates or a DirectionsRoute
